attributes.action: Amend the rules governing Seafarer's Earnings Deduction (SED)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rules governing SED should be changed. Any day onboard ship should be classed as a Q day,
Also the Half day rule should be scrapped. The Requirement to visit a foreign port should also be removed. 

Changing these rules would encourage more people to consider a career at sea, and would also help with personnel retention

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend the rules governing Seafarer's Earnings Deduction (SED)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21467


Prime Minister's Office
